meanings.definition: A woman's suit consisting of a jacket and trousers.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish pantsuit to the job interview.
meanings.sent2: Many women prefer to wear pantsuits to work for comfort and style.
meanings.sent3: The pantsuit walked into the meeting confidently, ready to impress.
meanings.sent4: Her pantsuit was like a powerful armor, boosting her confidence.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pantsuit made her stand out in the sea of black suits.

meanings.sent1: She pantsuits every day for work.
meanings.sent2: I will pantsuit for the important presentation.
meanings.sent3: He pantsuits like a fashion icon, even on casual Fridays.
meanings.sent4: Pantsuiting gives her a sense of empowerment and professionalism.
meanings.sent5: They always pantsuit when attending formal events.

meanings.definition: Pantsuits are often worn in professional settings.
meanings.sent1: In the office, many women choose to wear pantsuits.
meanings.sent2: The conference room was filled with people in pantsuits.
meanings.sent3: The pantsuits at the meeting made everyone look sharp and ready.
meanings.sent4: The pantsuits symbolized professionalism and confidence in the workplace.
meanings.sent5: She felt ready to conquer the day in her favorite pantsuit.
